header.aboutMe: I am passionate about building web applications from scratch, translating ideas into robust and scalable user-friendly experiences.

projects.about: These are some of the selected projects that show my passion for frontend development.

galleria.title: Art gallery
galleria.description: The project consists of a gallery of works of art by different artists.

clock.title: Clock
clock.description: In this project I built a web application that interacts with several APIs to obtain data such as time, date, city, time zone, etc. according to the location (IP) of the user and another API that generates random phrases. The background image varies depending on whether it is night or day, as well as the greeting and the icon.

todo.title: Todo list
todo.description: The project consists of an application to create to-do lists.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: In this project I created a basic calculator with the option to switch between 3 available themes.

githubUserSearch.title: Github user search app
githubUserSearch.description: The project consists of an application to search for Github users.
